TopicTitle: Orbit labels not showing up on trajectory

Articles.Content: When I launch my spacecraft, I am able to see my gray trajectory line, but I don't see the apoapsis symbol. I'm wondering what can I do to fix this? It's weird because it was showing before. When I go into training, it appears, but when I go into my career it doesn't show up all of a sudden. I even tried a new career mode and same thing. I tried resetting all the settings and it's still not showing up. Tracking station has all things marked to track. Any help would be greatly appreciated!
Welcome to the forum @Milosz,  are you playing a modded install?

21 minutes ago, Milosz said:

When I launch my spacecraft, I am able to see my gray trajectory line, but I don't see the apoapsis symbol. I'm wondering what can I do to fix this? It's weird because it was showing before. When I go into training, it appears, but when I go into my career it doesn't show up all of a sudden. I even tried a new career mode and same thing. I tried resetting all the settings and it's still not showing up. Tracking station has all things marked to track. Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Have you upgraded your tracking station?
If it's a career save you will not see apo/peri markers until you have upgraded the tracking station. And so, sounds like a gameplay issue, so your thread has been moved to Gameplay.
